title: Kimberly Jane Bowen Bock - The Beautiful Blonde
author: MaryGirl Moody
comment: thanks for sharing this beutiful video
description:
Special thank you to Phillips and Lucky Funeral Home in Giddings, Texas, for creating this video.

This DVD played at Kimberlys' memorial. Kimberly Bock was my best friend/soul sista. Born February 2nd, 1980, left this world to jam with the greatest in Heaven on August 14th, 2009. Sorry the picture jumps, I trembled terribly that day.

Since Beautiful Blonde will be released February 2nd, 2018 exclusively to my website, www.maryannmoody.us, for purchase, I decided to move the video to this channel.
